name: Tropical Stormfront
description: Tropical Stormfront is a retro real-time strategy (RTS) game played over tropical archipelagos. The game is inspired by the "Classic Empire" game and designed towards casual players. Units at your disposal include Humvees, Tanks, Artillery, Helicopters, Planes, Ships and Submarines amongst others. Tropical Stormfront supports multiplayer games over LAN and internet including co-op multiplayer.
